name: Memory leaves
description:
🍁 Memory leaves 🍁 Help the grandfather to remember as long as possible

A game by Tutustu Games

Controls

  • Played with a mouse or touch screen

Objective

  • Gather leaves, avoid mushrooms
  • Get to the end of the story

🍂🍂🍂🍂

A heartwarming game about a grandfather trying to remember the past. Help him by gathering the memory leaves.

A take on Alzheimer's disease taking one's memory; the paradox of living a hectic and a peaceful life simultaneously.

The game was created for the Great Autumn Game Jam: 2021 by Firith studio

🍂🍂🍂🍂

  • Concept, art, code, voice: Tutustu Games
  • Font: Alkhemikal by jeti
  • Sound effects: CC0 resources
